summary: Causes vampires to sparkle in the sunlight!
descriptionHtml:
Plutoman wanted to make a joke mod that made vampires sparkle in sunlight, as in the popular masterpiece Twilight. He was too much of a pansy to release such a magnificent alteration that I said \"well I\'m not a wimpy little kid, I\'ll do it.\" So I did.

Now, when the sun is out, dem vamps will sparkle like crazy little diamonds.

Enjoy.
author: ishmaeltheforsaken and Oscar Wilde

files.name: Ishs Twihard
files.changelogHtml: fixed the sparkles sparkling while inside
